full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RLUNG RTA TSE THAR BTZUN LA BKRA SHIS CHAR 'BEBS DANG RLUNG RTA'I BSANGS NI, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI CHEN WANG JANG JONG CHEN PO SRAS GNYIS PA, BSTAN PA DANG SRID PA'I RIG PA'I YON TAN PHUN SUM TSOGS SHING SKYES BU'I MTHU STZAL 'PHONG DANG LDAN PA'I GUNG YE SHES RGYA MTSO ZHES BYA BA, 'DI LTA ZHIG DGOS ZHES BKAS BSKUL BA'I DON DU, BYANG PHYOGS BSTAN PA'I GSOL BYED DZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG PO'I SLOB MA BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN GYIS SUG GIS BRIS PA'I DGE LEGS 'PHEL,, ,,MANGGA LAm,, ,,)
